Class TUdpServer

  • java.lang.Object

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class TUdpServer
extends TUdpTransport
implements java.lang.AutoCloseable
    A server for receiving data via Thrift UDP.

        public TUdpServer(java.net.SocketAddress socketAddress)
           throws java.net.SocketException
        Constructs a UDP server with the given host and port. Defaults to zero timeout.
        Parameters:
        socketAddress - the SocketAddress for this transport
        Throws:
        java.net.SocketException - if the underlying socket cannot be opened
